rules.name: Cross-file type mismatch
rules.description: Symbol used with a different type than declared elsewhere in the repository.

rules.name: Array out of bounds
rules.description: Array index exceeds statically declared size.

rules.name: Function signature drift
rules.description: Function call argument count does not match definition.

rules.name: Undefined symbol
rules.description: Reference to symbol not defined in repository or standard library.

rules.name: Shadowed symbol
rules.description: Variable may be shadowing a symbol from outer scope.

rules.name: Format string argument mismatch
rules.description: Printf-family format string has wrong number of specifiers vs arguments.

rules.name: Unused extern declaration
rules.description: Extern declaration is never referenced in the file.

rules.name: Dead import
rules.description: Imported name is never used in the file.

rules.name: Unsafe function usage
rules.description: Use of a C function known to cause buffer overflows.

rules.name: Argument type mismatch
rules.description: Function argument type does not match parameter annotation.

rules.name: Invalid struct member access
rules.description: Accessing a member that does not exist on the struct type.
